name: Melody
description: #Part3 "Every Sunday we used to meet each other at noon, so at first, we used to drink some tea, play chess and talk about our week, about everything. At two o'clock we used to stop playing chess, drink more tea and Arthur used to put a vinyl disc from Frank Sinatra to play. At this time, we used to stay quiet, just listening to the delicate sound of the flute, and of the piano being involved by the drums, it used to make our hearts beat together with the melody".
